data.eml:eml: Revision of the Dysmorphoptilidae with emarginate tegmina (Hemiptera: Auchenorryncha: Cicadomorpha: Prosboloidea) of the Queensland Triassic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lambkin, Kevin J. (2015): Revision of the Dysmorphoptilidae with emarginate tegmina (Hemiptera: Auchenorryncha: Cicadomorpha: Prosboloidea) of the Queensland Triassic. Zootaxa 3936 (3): 357-374, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3936.3.3
